column4: Hey guys. I'm trying to install 7.10 on a SATA hard drive, but gparted doesn't recognize my drive. It recognizes both IDE drives fine, though. How do I get it to recognize the SATA?
how new of a sata controller? may not be supported in the kernel that ubuntu is using
The computer is about 5 years old. The Motherboard is a Gigabyte Ga-K8n-Ultra-9 with built in SATA controllers.
not sure then, ive never really used sata much
